resources.string: Beer store \"\'t Proevertje\" is one of the biggest beer stores in Belgium. All the classic belgian beers, ranging from the famous belgian \'Trappisten\' (Westmalle, Westvleteren, Orval,...) to the well-known strong beers (Leffe, Grimbergen, Duvel, ...) to the fruit beers (Lindemans, Liefmans,...), but also imported beers (Guinness, Gordon,..) are available. You can buy them per bottle, or if you really thirsty, per crate (24 bottles).
